name: ComplianceSigns OSHA State Kit – California
description: A comprehensive safety kit tailored for California OSHA standards, with Cal/OSHA-specific signage, IIPP templates, and SDS documentation.
target_audience_match: Perfect for California business owners who worry about surprise Cal/OSHA inspections and just want to be audit-ready.

name: NY Safety First OSHA Kit
description: Built for New York businesses, this OSHA kit includes required labor law posters, bilingual emergency instructions, and PPE supplies.
target_audience_match: Ideal for New York employers stressed about staying compliant while keeping multilingual crews safe.

name: Nationwide OSHA Plus Kit
description: Covers strict regulations in CA, NY, WA and more—perfect for franchises or multi-site teams who need one kit that checks all boxes.
target_audience_match: Best for ops managers juggling multiple states and tired of tracking separate compliance rules.

name: J.J. Keller California IIPP Kit
description: Focused on Cal/OSHA’s Injury and Illness Prevention Program, this kit simplifies compliance with editable templates and guides.
target_audience_match: Perfect for California small businesses overwhelmed by IIPP paperwork but can’t afford a compliance consultant.

name: SafeWork State-Specific OSHA Kit Bundle
description: A customizable bundle with OSHA-compliant materials tailored by state—ideal for rotating job sites across CA, NY, and WA.
target_audience_match: Great for contractors or HR leads managing shifting crews in strict-regulation states.
